turns.speaker: HENRY
turns.text: Instead of going into his mind...

turns.speaker: MIRIAM
turns.text: When did he lapse into the coma?

turns.speaker: MIRIAM
turns.text: What about the legalities of this...?

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: Stargher is in custody.  The functional equivalent of being under arrest. Normally, we'd Mirandize him, and if he didn't lawyer up, we'd interrogate him. But because of his condition, he doesn't have the capacity to waive those rights.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: When we got here, you just topped and pulled her out.

turns.speaker: MIRIAM
turns.text: That was with Edward.  She's accustomed to his world.  Stargher's mind is unfamiliar territory.  She's "lost."  Someone has to go in. Remind her what's really happening.  And get her out.  Until then, she's at his mercy.

turns.speaker: MIRIAM
turns.text: I have done this, you know.  Been inside.

turns.speaker: MIRIAM
turns.text: I have to ask you some things... Are you taking any prescription drugs?

turns.speaker: MIRIAM
turns.text: I know your partner's here, but it's very important that you're honest.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: I am.  I'm a pretty boring guy.

turns.speaker: MIRIAM
turns.text: Yes.  But you're going to sit down right now.  I have to...

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: Thanks you.  Six weeks off does a body good.  I heard she got the approval to try the reversal with Edward.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: Federal Bureau of Investigation, ma'am. We know all, see all...

turns.speaker: TEDDY LEE
turns.text: Someone looking after her little girl?

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: Anne Vicksey didn't own a dog.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: The dog's an albino.  He'd love an animal like that.

turns.speaker: TEDDY LEE
turns.text: Gentlemen, I believe an albino dog is rare indeed.

turns.speaker: TEDDY LEE
turns.text: The Phoenix office tested that hair thirty minutes ago.  And we got the match.

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: Damn, man, I give up.  Your partner tells you his wife's gonna have a baby, and all you care about is a coroner's report!

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: Breeders typically destroy albino pups, so this animal is truly unique.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: Nicole Labetzki.  Victim seven. Forensics found dog hair in her car, but they had a K-9 unit at the scene and never had it checked.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: After three years she remembers what the guy drove?

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: She remembers because it was her "dream truck."  Wanted one just like it.

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: Let's give old Carl a call.  Tell him he's got company.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: No.  Can you get a man close?

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: We'll go back to his house, Pete. There's still a lot to do.  Analyze the videos, track sales of the bleach, go through his records.  Maybe he owns property somewhere.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: They're in that fucking thing for forty hours, Gordon.  Four-oh.  He got Julia at seven-thirty last night.  You know what time it is now...?!

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: You sure you want to go through with this?

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: I don't know, Pete, but for god's sake... This is nuts.  Do you really understand what they're going to do?

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: Why jeopardize what we've already done? We caught the sonofabitch.  Carl Stargher.  That's going to be like Bundy, Gacy, Dahmer.  A case that makes careers.  But if we push our luck.  If this is all bullshit and we come out smelling like it.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: Tell you what.  If this thing burns us, I take that heat.  I give you permission to point your finger at me and say "It was all his idea."

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: That's not what I'm talking about, Pete. I'm talking about waking up and realizing this girl's gonna die.

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: But you looked so cute.  All sleepy...

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: Jesus Christ, man, you look like hell.

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: You're bettin' the farm on something you saw after they pumped you full of god knows-what kind of shit?

turns.speaker: NOVAK
turns.text: I saw her.  Julia.  Alive.  I saw everything.

turns.speaker: RAMSEY
turns.text: You might've seen Jimmy Hoffa dancing with Timothy Leary.  I don't care.

turns.speaker: WOMAN
turns.text: Das mussen sie doch wissen. Ich meine ohne grund wird die politzei doch nicht ins Hans komme Fraulein Schmidt, ein schande...

turns.speaker: WOMAN
turns.text: Sayen sie ed our den Leuten damit sie es auch wissen.

turns.speaker: WOMAN
turns.text: Hier sind fruher Fursten ans unt eingeganger. Hier hat sogar ein Metternich verkehrt...

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Thank you. I enjoyed the play very much.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: But I could follow it fine. Perhaps Harry told you about me. My name's Holly Martins.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: No, he never told me about his friends. Would you like some tea?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Well, I saw you at the funeral.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I'm so sorry, I didn't notice much.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: You were in love with him, weren't you?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I don't know. How can you know a thing like that afterwards. I don't know anything any more.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh, American, thank you. I like them.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: I was talking to another friend of Harry's. A Baron Kurtz - do you know him?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Don't understand what Harry saw in a fellow like that.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: That was the man that brought me some money when Harry died. He said Harry had been anxious at the last moment.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: He said he remembered me too. Seems to show he wasn't in much pain.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: The doctor Harry used to go to. He was passing just after it happened.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Yes. They said it wasn't the driver's fault. Harry often said what a careful driver he was.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I know. I wondered about it a hundred times, if it really was an accident.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I don't know. They didn't answer.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: I was told there were only two men there.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: You shouldn't get mixed up in this.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Well, if I do find out something, can I look you up again?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Why don't you leave this town - go home?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: The police. They're searching my room. Sie mussen doch wissen.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Anything really wrong with your papers?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: The Russians would claim me. I come from Czechoslovakia.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Oh, what was the name of that doctor? Harry's doctor?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Yes. He moved his head, but the rest is good, isn't it?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Who are you looking for now?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: The Porter is going to talk to us tonight.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Need we go through it all again?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Might as well I suppose. Are you busy?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Just another part I've got to learn.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: I can try. Is it comedy, or tragedy?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Oh, let me see. No, no that's not the cue. It means she has to sit down.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Oh, we didn't make much sense. Drank too much. Once he tried...

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Oh, that was many years ago.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Oh, it's very difficult. You know Harry...we didn't do...

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: It's just what he used to say.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Well, I didn't learn that from him.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: If we have to see the Porter we'd better go.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: What's the hurry? Can't we talk quietly for a couple of minutes?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: A moment ago you said you didn't want to see the Porter.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Let's not get into any more trouble.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Sneak out the other way, and go back to your theatre. I'd better not see you again.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: What are you going to do?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I thought you were going to go away. Aren't the police after you?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Can you imagine a parrot nipping a man?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: He's better dead. I know he was mixed up - but not like that.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: I knew him for twenty years - at least I thought I knew him. I suppose he was laughing at fools like us all the time.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Seventy pounds a tube. He wanted me to write for his great medical charity.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I'll put these flowers in water.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Well, don't preach wisdom to me. You talk about him as if he had occasional bad manners.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: There isn't enough for two laughs.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: How did you know I would be here?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Have you been seeing Major Calloway again?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: What is on your mind? Why did you hide?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Hide? Can't a fellow have a drink?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Here, it will be cold on that train.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: You send me a wire as soon as you arrive.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: What is going to happen? Where is Harry?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: He's safe in the Russian zone.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Did he say anything about me - tell me?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: There's something wrong. Did you tell Calloway about meeting Harry?

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: Of course I didn't tell Calloway.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Why should he help me like that? The Russians will only make trouble for him.

turns.speaker: MARTINS
turns.text: We're getting you out of here, aren't we?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: If you want to sell your service, I'm not willing to be the price... I loved him. You loved him. What good have we done him. Look at yourself, they have names for faces like that.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: From Kurtz. They have just been arrested. But Harry won't come, he's not a fool.

turns.speaker: POPESCU
turns.text: Good evening, Miss Schmidt. You remember me?

turns.speaker: POPESCU
turns.text: I helped Harry fix her papers, Mr. Martins...

turns.speaker: POPESCU
turns.text: Entschuldigen sie. It was a terrible thing.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Must you take those letters? CALLOWAY Yes, I'm afraid so.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: You won't learn anything from them. They are only love letters. There are not many of them.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: They'll be returned to you, Miss Schmidt, as soon as they've been examined.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: Right. Sit down Miss Schmidt, we will send your letters and things back to you.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: You know as much as I do, Miss Schmidt - you were intimate with Lime, weren't you?

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: We loved each other, do you mean that?

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: He works in a military hospital.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: It's stupid to lie to me, Miss Schmidt. I'm in a position to help you.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: In one of his letters he asked you to telephone - a good friend of his called Joseph. He gave you the number of the Casanova Club. That is where a lot of friends of Lime used to go.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: What can I tell you but that you have got everything upside down.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: Now then, Miss Schmidt, I'm not interested in your forged papers - that's purely a Russian case. When did you last see Lime?

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: I want the truth, Miss Schmidt. We know he is alive.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: Joseph Harbin's body was found in the coffin.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: What did you say? I'm sorry...

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: I said another man was buried in his place.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: That's what we want to find out.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: I'm sorry - I don't seem able to understand anything you say. He's alive now this minute - he's doing something.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: Miss Schmidt, we know he is somewhere across the canal in the Russian sector... You may as well help us. In a few minutes Colonel Brodsky will be questioning you about your papers. Tell me where Lime is.

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: If you help me, I am prepared to help you. ANNA Martins always said you were a fool...

turns.speaker: CALLOWAY
turns.text: Vienna is a closed city, Miss Schmidt, he can't get away.

turns.speaker: ANNA
turns.text: Poor Harry, I wish he was dead, he would be safe from all of you then.
